translations.text: Chisimu Uwwe tujitulwisye jalakwe (Qur'aniji) m’Chilo Chakuchimbichika.
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Chilo Chakuchimbichika?
Chilo Chakuchimbichikachi chiŵele chambone nnope kupunda myesi jakwana sausande (1000).<sup foot_note=195473>1</sup>
Achimalaika akasatulukaga pamo ni Nsimu (Jibulilu) mu Chele (Chilochi) kwa lisosa lya M’mbuje gwao, kwisa kulondesya chindu chilichose (pakuchiŵika mu mpango wakwe).<sup foot_note=195474>1</sup>
Ntunjelele-tunjelelepe! Chele Chilocho, mpaka kumasikusiku.<sup foot_note=195475>1</sup>
